author: Paul Roberts
comment: The app is good but sometimes the voice output doesn't work. It would be great if some of the info showed on the lock screen.

author: Kevin Marko
comment: Seriously, this costs over $8. The user interface/experience is terrible. The worst out of every GPS logging application I've tried. Please update to a modern UX. 3 stars because I love how accurate it is, and automatic uploads to different logging dashboards.
title: Outdated UI

author: J Cotton
comment: I have used this app since it was on the Pocket PC. The service is incredible and the product only gets better. The only thing i would change is that I would like to see custom voice settings that change with the sport chosen.
title: Great app!

author: A Google User
comment: Like many long term users, I started with pocket pc. The functionality it's still tops, but hasn't been updated since then, apart from bits. They already have my money, so they're not missing out from me. But for simple and current, I've been recommending Runtastic to all my new runners. I just can't justify recommending good software if it's old and expensive. Time to update!
title: Great but stagnant

author: A Google User
comment: But UI and Web site need updating
title: Still the best

author: A Google User
comment: Great app. Latest version fixed several issues. Tried every tracker, finally decided this was worth the cost for features and flexibility. Droid.

author: A Google User
comment: Love the web portal rankings! Works great on my Droid.

author: A Google User
comment: Good product but don't bother if you have a Moto Droid cause you cannot lock the screen. This causes frequent unwanted activity like screen configs.
